pull.title: Scripts and tools: Fix BIND_NOW check in security-check.py
pull.body: Previously, the BIND_NOW check would work only if it was the first value in FLAGS.

verification.payload:
tree 6ae65b6f57bac6a5cab51a8cd76b8a918777ef00
parent dcb154e5aad80e49ff41a7851604ac46f38cb167
author Conrado Gouvea <conradoplg@gmail.com> 1531412161 -0300
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1531412161 -0300

Tools: fix BIND_NOW check in security-check.py

Previously, the BIND_NOW check would work only if it was the first value in FLAGS.

events.message:
Tools: fix BIND_NOW check in security-check.py

Previously, the BIND_NOW check would work only if it was the first value in FLAGS.

events.body: Makes sense, I"m fairly sure this was the intent. Thanks. utACK 37d363dd4acf7d41196d44b295593019add241c3

issue.body:
Change gitian-descriptors to use bionic instead

Trivial: fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13298

Initialize m_next_send_inv_to_incoming
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13679

Add depends 32-bit arm support for bitcoin-qt
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13604

Add scantxoutset RPC method

contrib: correct version check

Modified in_addr6 cast in CConman class to work with msvc
